section1.good_choice_item1: Le Sueur Premium Whole Green Beans
section1.good_choice_reason1: contribute positively to your vegetable intake
section1.good_choice_reason2: offer a natural and wholesome whole fruit option rich in fiber

section2.user_goals: reduce added sugar, reduce sodium, and increase vegetable intake

goal_feedback.feedback_text: Great work! You made great progress with reducing added sugar. This was due to your purchases of GHIRARDELLI Semi-Sweet Chocolate Premium Baking Chips because they contain minimal added sugars.
goal_feedback.feedback_items: GHIRARDELLI Semi-Sweet Chocolate Premium Baking Chips

goal_feedback.feedback_text: Some choices this week didn’t align with your dietary goal of reducing sodium. You purchased Hillshire Farm Ultra Thin Oven Roasted Turkey Breast Deli Lunch Meat, which didn't contribute to your goal because processed lunch meats can be high in sodium.
goal_feedback.feedback_items: Hillshire Farm Ultra Thin Oven Roasted Turkey Breast Deli Lunch Meat

goal_feedback.feedback_text: Great work! You made good progress with increasing vegetable intake. This was due to your purchases of Fresh Green Bell Pepper because it is rich in vitamins and nutrients, boosting your vegetable intake.

section3.fruits_explanation: You did not have whole fruits in your basket, which contributed to a low score. However, the inclusion of Fresh Fuji Apples adds potential for improvement. Including more whole fruits is beneficial because they provide essential vitamins and fiber. Fruits are essential for vitamins, minerals, and fiber. Try getting more variety next week!
section3.vegetables_explanation: You had a good score due to Fresh Green Bell Pepper. Vegetables are high in essential vitamins and minerals and low in calories, supporting overall health. Keep including more different vegetables!
section3.grains_explanation: Aunt Millie's Whole Grain White Bread contributed moderately, offering some whole grains. Whole grains provide more nutrients and fiber than refined grains. Whole grains are crucial for fiber, B vitamins, and various minerals. Choose whole grain versions more often.
section3.dairy_explanation: This low score was due to minimal dairy product purchases such as Country Fresh 2% Reduced Fat Milk. Dairy provides calcium and vitamin D, important for bone health. Consider including more dairy items like yogurts or cheeses.
section3.protein_explanation: Hillshire Farm Ultra Thin Oven Roasted Turkey Breast Deli Lunch Meat and Chicken of the Sea Wild Caught Chub Mackerel in Brine boosted your protein score since they are lean protein sources. Protein is important for body maintenance and growth. Keep it up!
section3.fattyacids_explanation: This was low due to choices like Odom's Tennessee Pride Mild Sausage, which primarily contributes saturated fats. Fatty acids, especially omega-3s, support heart health. Consider enriching this category with more sources like fish and nuts next week.

section4.refinedgrains_explanation: You had a high amount of refined grains in items like Ball Park White Hot Dog Buns. Refined grains are lower in fiber and nutrients, potentially leading to blood sugar spikes. Try substituting these with whole grains for better health benefits.
section4.sodium_explanation: This score was impacted by Hillshire Farm Ultra Thin Oven Roasted Turkey Breast Deli Lunch Meat. High sodium can lead to high blood pressure and heart issues. Look to reduce processed meats and find low-sodium alternatives.
section4.addedsugars_explanation: Your basket had minimal items with added sugars, like GHIRARDELLI Semi-Sweet Chocolate Premium Baking Chips. High added sugar can cause weight gain and dental cavities. Excellent job!
section4.saturatedfats_explanation: Land O Lakes Unsalted Stick Butter led to high saturated fat. Saturated fats can increase heart disease risk—try to moderate intake of such products. Consider using plant-based oils or spreads instead.

section5.recommendation1: Ball Park White Hot Dog Buns contributed to a poor Refined Grains score. Next week, try swapping for whole grain bread options.
section5.food_to_substitute1: Ball Park White Hot Dog Buns
section5.recommendation2: Hillshire Farm Ultra Thin Oven Roasted Turkey Breast Deli Lunch Meat affected your Sodium score. Next week, try lean meats or low-sodium alternatives to reduce sodium.
section5.food_to_substitute2: Hillshire Farm Ultra Thin Oven Roasted Turkey Breast Deli Lunch Meat
section5.recommendation3: Land O Lakes Unsalted Stick Butter contributed to a poor Saturated Fats score. Next week, try plant-based oil spreads to improve heart health.
section5.food_to_substitute3: Land O Lakes Unsalted Stick Butter
